user_posts.post_caption:
Before I even start singing to my mom her special Happy Birthday song, she starts to cry 🥹

Probably because I always sing in keys that don’t exist 🤣 🎶🙋🏽‍♂️

HAPPY BIRTHDAY MOM!!!
75 years of experience, wisdom, hard times, good times, laughter, mana, and yet thru it all — you TRULY have the KINDEST HEART I have ever known ❤️💫

I feel like the luckiest son on earth. 

Happy Birthday Mom 
Ou Te Alofa Ia Te Oe 🌺

I love how this little superhero pointed to himself, as if to say, “who me?” 😊

Good to meet you young man, keep being an inspiration to everyone around you - including me. 

Stay strong ~ Rock 🩵 
@makeawishamerica 
#smackdown

I knew my boy @jamesjeffersonj had this Rock wax statue in his roasting crosshairs 😂💣🔥 

“is this how y’all felt when you lost the Little Mermaid?” 
🤣 legit belly laughed at this ☝🏾 

For the record, I’m going to have my team reach out to our friends at Grevin Museum, in Paris France 🇫🇷 so we can work at “updating” my wax figure here with some important details and improvements- starting with my skin color 🤣✊🏾💪🏾 

And next time I’m in Paris, I’ll stop in and have a drink with myself 🥃 😉

Productive @Teremana➕Siete Bucks Spirits board meeting with ownership + management. 

Grateful to share our Teremana tequila’s unprecedented growth/sales puts us in the rare air of TOP 5 tequilas in the world 🙏🏾

Thank you to our great partners, the Lopez Family in Jesus Maria, Mexico, Mast Jagermeister, Southern Glazers, and all our phenomenal & hard working distributors coast to coast and around the world 
🇺🇸 🌎 

Most of all, THANK YOU to all of you - our MANA OHANA out there who raise your glasses with me for our Teremana toast celebrating the good times, the not so good times and everything in between ❤️🥃

Quality. Taste. Legacy. 

We build Teremana step by step. 

Cheers 🥃🖊️🤓 

~ founder + chairman 
teremana tequila 
#tequilaofthepeople

Love this perspective from @UFC Featherweight Champion @alexvolkanovski. 

People only see the success of something, which is often just the tip of the iceberg - and they never see the massive structure of discipline and hard work that’s beneath the surface. 

As I refer to it - the rest of the iceberg. 

I have massive love & respect for all MMA/UFC athletes and happy to help grow the sport in any way I can.

Appreciate you brother @alexvolkanovski sitting down with @sevenbucksprod and good luck tonight champ and cheers to “the rest of the iceberg” 

#UFC294 #InAbuDhabi

Great insight into @islam_makhachev’s mindset on fight night. 

All the hard work to prepare is done and the moment is here to walk to that cage, move the crowd and lay it all on the line. 

Appreciate you brother @islam_makhachev sitting down with our @sevenbucksprod and good luck tonight in your championship fight. 

#UFC294 #InAbuDhabi

When I catch this filthy animal..
😂💀🙋🏽‍♂️🪞🎈

Join us in raising a glass to our incredible @Teremana Mana Ohana family of bartenders and hospitality workers across the country 🇺🇸🥃🙏🏾

We’re proud to announce our ‘Mana for a Cause’ program, which helps those hard-working people and shows our endless gratitude for everything they do. 

@Teremana will donate $250,000 to @AnotherRoundAnotherRally, a nonprofit that supplies emergency assistance and education resources to bar and restauraunt workers across America 🇺🇸

JOIN US in raising a @Teremana toast 🥃 to our favorite bartenders by visiting ManaForACause.com (link in bio) and finding a location near you to enjoy a Teremana cocktail. Be sure to tag @Teremana in all your posts.

SALUD to our Mana Ohana bartenders and restaurant workers across our great nation 🥃🇺🇸👏🏾 

#ManaForACause 
#TeremanaTequila 
#TequilaOfThePeople

I usually never post these special vids to @instagram but it was on my heart today, and the mana feels strong… 

Mallory Clifford of Garrett, Indiana this is for you 😊

If I ever get to Garrett, I’ll look forward to meeting you! 
Then I’ll need a gym, tequila and tell the kids get ready, we’re getting pizza 🍕🤣👊🏾

Your strength is inspiring to all those around you, myself now included. 

Thank you for being an amazing fan and I hope this vid brings a bit of joy to you and the kids ❤️

~ DJ aka Denzel 

ps - I have a few small surprises for all of you coming in a week or so 🤙🏾 🎁
